verses.text: And it came to pass in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, that the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* their \w armies|strong="H4264"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w* for \w warfare|strong="H6635"\w*, to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. And \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Know|strong="H3045"\w* thou \w assuredly|strong="H3045"\w*, that thou shalt go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* with me to \w battle|strong="H4264"\w*, thou and thy \w men|strong="H0582"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w*, \w Surely|strong="H3651"\w* thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* what thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* can \w do|strong="H6213"\w*. And \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, Therefore will I \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thee \w keeper|strong="H8104"\w* of mine \w head|strong="H7218"\w* for \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ Now \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w lamented|strong="H5594"\w* him, and \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, even in his own \w city|strong="H5892"\w*. And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* had put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* those that had familiar \w spirits|strong="H0178"\w*, and the \w wizards|strong="H3049"\w*, out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Shunem|strong="H7766"\w*: and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, and they \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Gilboa|strong="H1533"\w*.

And when \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, he was \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, and his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w trembled|strong="H2729"\w*.

And when \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* him not, neither by \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*, nor by \w Urim|strong="H0224"\w*, nor by \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* unto his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w Seek|strong="H1245"\w* me a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* that \w hath|strong="H1172"\w* a familiar \w spirit|strong="H0178"\w*, that I may \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to her, and \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of her. And his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to him, Behold, \add there is\add* a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* that \w hath|strong="H1172"\w* a familiar \w spirit|strong="H0178"\w* at \w Endor|strong="H5874"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w disguised|strong="H2664"\w* himself, and put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w raiment|strong="H0899"\w*, and he \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* with him, and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I pray thee, \w divine|strong="H7080"\w* unto me by the familiar \w spirit|strong="H0178"\w*, and bring me \add him\add* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, whom I shall \w name|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee.

And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Behold, thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* what \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, how he hath cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* those that have familiar \w spirits|strong="H0178"\w*, and the \w wizards|strong="H3049"\w*, out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: wherefore then layest thou a \w snare|strong="H5367"\w* for my \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, to cause me to \w die|strong="H4191"\w*?

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* to her by the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, there \w shall|strong="H0518"\w* no \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w* \w happen|strong="H7136"\w* to thee for this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, Whom shall I bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto thee? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Bring me \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*.

And when the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, she \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: and the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Why hast thou \w deceived|strong="H7411"\w* me? for thou \add art\add* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, Be not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*: for what \w sawest|strong="H7200"\w* thou? And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w ascending|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, What \w form|strong="H8389"\w* \add is\add* he of? And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, An \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* cometh \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; and he \add is\add* \w covered|strong="H5844"\w* with a \w mantle|strong="H4598"\w*. And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w perceived|strong="H3045"\w* that it \add was\add* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, and he \w stooped|strong="H6915"\w* with \add his\add* \w face|strong="H0639"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* himself.\f + \fr 28.14 \ft What…: Heb. What is his form?\f*

¶ And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, Why hast thou \w disquieted|strong="H7264"\w* me, to bring me \w up|strong="H5927"\w*? And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I am \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w distressed|strong="H6887"\w*; for the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* make \w war|strong="H3898"\w* against me, and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* is \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* from me, and \w answereth|strong="H6030"\w* me no more, neither \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, nor by \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*: therefore I have \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thee, that thou mayest make \w known|strong="H3045"\w* unto me what I shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.\f + \fr 28.15 \ft by prophets: Heb. by the hand of prophets\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, Wherefore then dost thou \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* of me, seeing the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* from thee, and is become thine \w enemy|strong="H6145"\w*?

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to him, as he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* by \w me|strong="H3027"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* out of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w given|strong="H5414"\w* it to thy \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, \add even\add* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*:  +  r 28.17  t to him: or, for himself *  +  r 28.17  t me: Heb. mine hand *

\w Because|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w obeyedst|strong="H8085"\w* not the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, nor \w executedst|strong="H6213"\w* his \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* upon \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*, therefore hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* unto thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Moreover the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will also \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with thee into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: and to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* \add shalt\add* thou and thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \add be\add* with me: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* also shall \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

Then \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w straightway|strong="H4116"\w* \w all|strong="H4393"\w* \w along|strong="H6967"\w* on the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and was \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, because of the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*: and there was no \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* in him; for he had \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* no \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, nor all the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.\f + \fr 28.20 \ft fell…: Heb. made haste, and fell with the fulness of his stature\f*

¶ And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that he was \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0926"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Behold, thine \w handmaid|strong="H8198"\w* hath \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and I have \w put|strong="H7760"\w* my \w life|strong="H5315"\w* in my \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*, and have \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which thou \w spakest|strong="H1696"\w* unto me.

Now therefore, I pray thee, \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* thou also unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of thine \w handmaid|strong="H8198"\w*, and let me \w set|strong="H7760"\w* a \w morsel|strong="H6595"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee; and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, that thou mayest have \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*, when thou \w goest|strong="H3212"\w* on thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

But he \w refused|strong="H3985"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*. But his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, together with the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w compelled|strong="H6555"\w* him; and he \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*. So he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*.

And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* had a \w fat|strong="H4770"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and she \w hasted|strong="H4116"\w*, and \w killed|strong="H2076"\w* it, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w flour|strong="H7058"\w*, and \w kneaded|strong="H3888"\w* \add it\add*, and did \w bake|strong="H0644"\w* unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* thereof:

And she \w brought|strong="H5066"\w* \add it\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*; and they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*. Then they rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and went \w away|strong="H3212"\w* that \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.
